name: Genetically Modified Goldfish
description:
You are a very hungry fish, with some very weird DNA. Good luck.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD or arrow keys
  • Spacebar to pause
  • M to mute
  • E to spawn a new generation, when the time comes.

Submitted for Weekly Game Jam 219, with the theme 'Evolution'.

Inspired by Fishy: Fish Eat Fish.

Made in Unreal Engine 4.24.3. There are occasional minor bugs, but that's the price of getting to play in browser. We will probably make a smoother, prettier version available for download at some point, so keep your eyes out.

Programming by Bella Blackwood (FNGD).

Asset design and creation by Sam Blackwood (FNGD).

Lore by Peter Knak.

Music is Shopping List by Komiku | Music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ 

Sound effects come from manuelaurreaf, InspectorJ, Clearwavsound and Boom Library. Some have been cropped or otherwise edited by us.
